name: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the basics of game development, including game design principles, programming, and graphics.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Master Unity, one of the most popular game development platforms, and create your own games.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Learn how to create realistic 3D characters for games using industry-standard software.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Explore the world of game audio, sound design, and music composition for games.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Create mobile games using Unreal Engine, a powerful game development tool.

name: Software Engineering
details: Become a game tester and learn the skills needed to ensure game quality.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Discover marketing and monetization strategies for indie game developers.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn how to create immersive VR games and experiences for various platforms.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Master the art of game design and storytelling to create compelling game narratives.
